title.en: A Prayer to the Omnipresent Lord Vajradhara Jampa Kunga Tendzin

text.en: Namo gurave!
text.en-trans: namo guru wé

text.en: Embodiment of the wisdom of all the victorious ones and their heirs,
text.en-trans: sé ché gyalwa yong kyi yeshe kyi

text.en: Omnipresent lord, glorious Vajradhara,
text.en-trans: chizuk khyabdak palden dorjé chang

text.en: Foremost among the saffron-robed monks of this degenerate age,
text.en-trans: nyikdü ngurmik dzinpé khyuchok ché

text.en: Great all-knowing khenpo, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khenchen tamché khyenpar solwa deb

text.en: Outwardly restrained through the pratimokṣa vows,
text.en-trans: chitar sosor tarpé gyü dom shing

text.en: Inwardly rich with the wealth of twofold bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: nang du changchub sem nyi nor gyi chuk

text.en: And secretly realized as a mahāsiddha,
text.en-trans: sangwa drubpa chenpo ngön du dzé

text.en: Great benevolent guide, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: jamden drenpa chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Endowed with the noble riches that delight all the learned ones,
text.en-trans: khé kün gawé pak nor jorpa dang

text.en: Unrivalled teacher and author, whose vast assembly of students uphold the teachings,
text.en-trans: ché tsom dadral tendzin lob tsok gyé

text.en: Possessor of an immaculate resplendence,
text.en-trans: drima mepé ziji dang denpa

text.en: Second lord of sages, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: tubwang nyipé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You bestow the splendour of great liberation
text.en-trans: khyé ku tong dang sung gi chashé kyi

text.en: On all who see your form or read or hear your words,
text.en-trans: tong tödrol ba chenpö pal ter zhing

text.en: And you spread the tradition of Kunga1in a hundred directions—
text.en-trans: kün gé ringluk chok gyar pelwa la

text.en: To you whose life of liberation is unequalled, I pray.
text.en-trans: namtar tsungpamé la solwa deb

text.en: Your immaculate discipline enhances your youthfulness,
text.en-trans: zakmé tsultrim zhönnu ring du tro

text.en: Your meditative absorption strengthens the nectar of great bliss,
text.en-trans: tingdzin dechen dütsi tob gyé shing

text.en: And your profound wisdom perceives the nature of all things—
text.en-trans: sherab zab mö chö kün jizhin zik

text.en: Great master of the threefold training, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: lab sum wangchuk chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Employing the ten principles of mantra, outer, inner and secret,
text.en-trans: chi nang sangwé denyi chu dangden

text.en: You perfected the yogas of generation and completion,
text.en-trans: kyé dang dzokpé naljor tarchin ching

text.en: And through fourfold dissolution on the paths of the four empowerments,
text.en-trans: wang zhi lam gyi drö zhi timpar lé

text.en: Attained the supreme thirteenth bhūmi—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: chusum sa chok nyé la solwa deb

text.en: Master who emanates and absorbs an ocean of maṇḍalas,
text.en-trans: kyilkhor gyatsö trodü jepo ni

text.en: Who possesses the supremely immutable great bliss of union,
text.en-trans: khajor chok tu mingyur dewa ché

text.en: Entirely filled with compassion, great and inexpressible by nature—
text.en-trans: nyingjé yong gang rangzhin jödral ché

text.en: Guru Cakrasaṃvara, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: lama khorlo dompar solwa deb

text.en: Through the blessings of praying in this way,
text.en-trans: detar solwa tabpé jin lab kyi

text.en: May the supreme guru always guide and care for me throughout all my lives,
text.en-trans: kyewa küntu lama chok dé yi

text.en: May we spontaneously accomplish our own and others’ welfare,
text.en-trans: jezung rangzhen dön nyi lhün gyi drub

text.en: And bestow the glory of benefit and happiness upon the teachings and beings.
text.en-trans: ten dang dro la pendé pal ter shok
